description.en:
### Sex with My Childhood Friend (Part 1)
In a place where the mountain wind blows fiercely across the fields spread across the countryside...

The protagonist studies very hard in order to get into the same urban university where the girl who is his unrequited love has applied. However, his raven-haired, big-breasted and cute childhood friend is also skipping about and following him around today. She plays all the cards in her hand to try and disturb his studies, including inviting him to play games and even kissing him. Her reason being that she wants the protagonist — who is the one she loves — to stay in the countryside.

They're childhood friends after all...
But after crossing that line, the two of them will be like beasts thirsting for each other's bodies.

(Source: FANZA)

| Part 1 | Tags |

| female: | big breasts, defloration, kissing, nakadashi, pantyhose, schoolgirl uniform, sole female, sweating
| mixed: | childhood friends
| other: | full censorship, multi-work series

---

### Sex with My Childhood Friend (Part 2)
On a hot summer school day, the junior is unexpectedly reunited with her beloved senior.

"I'll be helping you study." with those words, he leads her into his house; but for a young man and woman like this, there's no way nothing will happen between them.

This is a youthful and lovey-dovey erotic manga about students leaving their duties behind, indulging in their desires for each other until evening comes!

(Source: FANZA)
